name: Promotion Class: Stormcaller
description:
Role: Ranged Damage

Eschewing the balance of nature for pure destruction, the caller of storms has one purpose.

Stat Adjustments:
Attack Power +225
Basic Attack Damage +6%

Traits Granted:
Buckler Proficiency
Sickle Mastery
Buckler Mastery

Enhancements:
Blight: Now spawns an Electric field that deal periodic damage in an area.
Bark Skin: Now is self only, the duration is increased and also debuffs Electric Mitigation of enemies that attack you.
Grasping Roots: Now ensnared enemies take more Elemental damage.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Stormcaller promotion class and prevents access to the Archdruid and Earthkeeper promotion classes.
